snippet.title: The Gauntlet - Trailer - Are you fast enough?
snippet.description:
The Gauntlet - Can you beat The Gauntlet? 

They say it's only a game show, but you're playing for your life.
Run or Die.
Can you survive long enough for bragging rights?

#scattergoodstudios #indiegamedev #games #thegauntlet 
#wipeout #wipeoutusa #wipeoutgaming #parkour 

Download the demo game now on Itch:
https://scattergoodstudios.itch.io/the-gauntlet

Available soon to purchase on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/scattergood-studios

Developed By:
Round Table Studios, Dublin

Published by
Scattergood Studios
https://www.scattergood.io
(c) Scattergood Studios 2024

Merch Store
-----------------------
https://www.scattergood.io/store/
